member.name: T:Neon.Docker.DockerClient
member.summary: Implements a client that can submit commands to a Docker engine via the Docker Remote API.

member.summary: Parses a value into an instance of the specified type by converting it to JSON and then parsing that.

member.summary: Constructor.

member.summary: Releases all resources associated with the instance.

member.summary: Releases all associated resources.
member.param: Pass true if we're disposing, false if we're finalizing.

member.summary: Returns the version of the Docker Remote API implemented by this class.

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.DockerClient.Settings
member.summary: Returns the .

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.DockerClient.JsonClient
member.summary: Returns the underlying .

member.name: M:Neon.Docker.DockerClient.GetUri(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the URI for a specific command.

member.name: M:Neon.Docker.DockerClient.PingAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Ping the remote Docker engine to verify that it's ready.

remarks.note: This method does not use a .

member.name: M:Neon.Docker.DockerClient.WaitUntilReadyAsync(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Waits for the Docker engine or Swarm manager to be ready to accept requests.
member.param: The maximum timne to wait (defaults to 120 seconds).

remarks.para: The Swarm Manager can return unexpected HTTP response codes when it is not ready to accept requests. For example, a request to /volumes may return a 404: Not Found response rather than the 503: Service Unavailable that one would expect. The server can return this even when return successfully.
This method attempts to ensure that the server is really ready.

member.summary: Creates a Docker network.

member.summary: Lists the networks managed by the Docker engine.

member.summary: Returns details about a specific Docker network.

member.name: M:Neon.Docker.DockerClient.NetworkRemove(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes a Docker network.

member.summary: Lists the services deployed to a Docker Swarm.

summary.para: The image used to provision the service container.

member.summary: Returns the without any SHA hash appended to the tag.

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceContainerSpec.StopGracePeriod
member.summary: Time to wait for a service container to stop gracefully before killing it forcefully (in nanoseconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceContainerSpec.HealthCheck
member.summary: Specifies how service container health check are to be performed.

summary.para: Lists the hostname/IP address mappings to add to the service container [/etc/hosts] file. Each entry is formatted like:

summary.para: Holds the details describing a running Docker swarm service from the service list or inspection REST APIs.
summary.note: This type matches the Docker API v1.35.

member.summary: Returns the time (UTC) the service was created (as a ).

summary.note: This value is encoded as decimal. You'll need to convert to octal to see what it looks like as standard Linux permissions.

member.name: T:Neon.Docker.ServiceRestartCondition
member.summary: Enumerates the service restart conditions.

member.summary: Restart whenever a service task exits for any reason.

member.summary: Never restart.

member.summary: Restart only when a service task returns a non zero exit code.

member.summary: Specifies the condition under which a service container should be restarted.

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceRestartPolicy.Delay
member.summary: Deplay between restart attempts (nanoseconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceRestartPolicy.MaxAttempts
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of container restart attempts before giving up.

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceRestartPolicy.Window
member.summary: Specifies the window of time during which the restart policy will be enavluated (nanoseconds).

member.summary: Specifies the rollback strategy for a service.

member.summary: Maximum number of tasks to be rolled back in parallel during an rollback interation.

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceRollbackConfig.Delay
member.summary: Time between rollback iterations (in nanoseconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceRollbackConfig.FailureAction
member.summary: Action to take if an rolled back task fails to run or stops running during the rollback.

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceRollbackConfig.Monitor
member.summary: Time to monitor rolled back tasks for failure (in nanoseconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceRollbackConfig.MaxFailureRatio
member.summary: The fraction of tasks that may fail during an rollback before the failure '] action is invoked, specified as a floating point number between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceRollbackConfig.Order
member.summary: Specifies the order in which the running task is stopped and the rolledback task is started.

member.summary: Enumerates the service rollback failure actions.

member.summary: Pause the service task rollback on failure.

member.name: F:Neon.Docker.ServiceRollbackFailureAction.Continue
member.summary: Continue the service task rollback on failure.

member.summary: Enumerates the service task rollback order options.

member.name: F:Neon.Docker.ServiceRollbackOrder.StopFirst
member.summary: Stop the current service task before rolling back to the previous settings.

member.name: F:Neon.Docker.ServiceRollbackOrder.StartFirst
member.summary: Rollback a current service task to the previous setting first before stopping the current task.

member.summary: Time to monitor updated tasks for failure (in nanoseconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Docker.ServiceUpdateConfig.MaxFailureRatio
member.summary: The fraction of tasks that may fail during an update before the failure '] action is invoked, specified as a floating point number between 0 and 1.

member.summary: Specifies the order in which the running task is stopped and the new task is started.

member.summary: Continue scheduling updated service tasks on failure.

member.summary: Stop a service task first and then start its replacement.

member.name: F:Neon.Docker.ServiceUpdateOrder.StartFirst
member.summary: Start a service replacement task first and before stopping the original task.
